start.welcome: Welcome to SmashRank! You're registered and ready to play.
start.already_registered: You're already registered! Use /game to log a match.
leaderboard.title: Office Rankings
leaderboard.empty: No matches played yet. Start with /game!
stats.title: Stats for {{name}}
game.cooldown: You just logged a match with this player. Wait a couple minutes.
game.player_not_found: Player @{{username}} not found. They need to /start first.
error.invalid_set_score: Invalid set score. Winning score must be ≥11, and win by 2 in deuce (e.g. 12-10).
error.group_only: This command only works in group chats.
season.new: Season {{name}} has begun! All ratings reset to 1000. Let's go!
help.text:
SmashRank — Office Table Tennis ELO

Commands:
/start — Register yourself
/game @user 11-7 11-5 — Log a match
/game @user 2-0 — Log with set count only
/game @user won 2-1 — Explicit winner
/newgame — Guided match logging
/undo — Undo last match (within 5 min)
/leaderboard — Top players in this group
/stats — Your stats
/stats @user — Someone else's stats
/h2h @user — Head-to-head record
/achievements — Your achievements
/achievements @user — Someone else's achievements
/doubles @partner vs @opp1 @opp2 scores — Log doubles
/newdoubles — Guided doubles logging
/settings — Group settings (admin)
/lang en|ru — Change your language
/help — This message

Score rules:
• Winning score must be ≥11
• Win by 2 in deuce (12-10, 14-12, etc.)
undo.success: Last match undone: {{winner}} vs {{loser}}. Ratings restored.
undo.no_match: No recent match to undo. You can only undo within 5 minutes.
h2h.title: {{player}} vs {{opponent}}
newgame.no_opponents: No recent opponents found. Use /game @username score instead.
achievement.title: Achievements for {{name}} ({{count}})
settings.title: Group Settings
settings.usage:
Usage: /settings <key> <value>

Keys:
• commentary on|off
• achievements on|off
• digest daily|weekly|off
settings.invalid_value: Invalid value. Use on/off (or daily/weekly/off for digest).
settings.admin_only: Only group admins can change settings.
doubles.partner_not_found: Partner @{{username}} not found. They need to /start first.
doubles.opponent_not_found: Opponent @{{username}} not found. They need to /start first.
doubles.self_play: Can't have the same player on both sides.
digest.title: Weekly Digest for {{group}}
digest.no_activity: No matches this week. Get playing!
